questions.prompt: 1. My heart beats fast.
2. My muscles are tense.
3. I feel agonized over my problems.
4. I think that others won't approve of me.
5. I feel like I am missing out on things because I cannot make up my mind soon enough.
6. I feel dizzy.
7. My muscles feel weak.
8. I feel trembly and shaky.
9. I picture some future misfortune.
10. I know how to read and write.
11. I can't get some thought out of my mind.
12. I have trouble remembering things.
13. My face feels hot.
14. I think that the worst will happen.
15. My arms and legs feel stiff.
16. My throat feels dry.
17. I keep busy to avoid uncomfortable thoughts.
18. I cannot concentrate without irrelevant thoughts intruding.
19. My breathing is fast and shallow.
20. I worry that I cannot control my thoughts as well as I would like to.
21. I have butterflies in the stomach.
22. My palms feel clammy.

STICSA_T.preamble: Below is a list of statements which can be used to describe how people feel. For each statement there are four answers which indicate how often each statement is true of you (e.g., not at all, very much so). Please read each statement carefully and select the answer which best indicates how often, in general, the statement is true of you.
STICSA_T.name: STICSA_T

questions.prompt: 1. Unforeseen events upset me greatly.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 2. It frustrates me not having all the information I need.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 3. Uncertainty keeps me from living a full life.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 4. One should always look ahead so as to avoid surprises.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 5. A small unforeseen event can spoil everything, even with the best of planning.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 6. When it is time to act, uncertainty paralyses me.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 7. When I am uncertain I cannot function very well.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 8. I always answer these survey questions honestly.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 9. I always want to know what the future has in store for me.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 10. I cannot stand being taken by surprise.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 11. The smallest doubt can stop me from acting.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 12. I should be able to organize everything in advance.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

questions.prompt: 13. I must get away from all uncertain situations.
labels: Not at all characteristic of me

IUS.preamble: Please select the answer that best corresponds to how much you agree with each item.
IUS.name: IUS

questions.prompt: 1. Do you ever feel sad?
2. Do you ever feel pessimistic about everything?
3. Do you ever feel as if there is no future for you?
4. Do you ever feel as if you do not want to live anymore?
5. Do you ever find yourself having more than two feet?
6. Do you ever cry about nothing?
7. Do you ever feel guilty?
8. Do you ever feel like a failure?
9. Do you ever feel tense?

CAPE.preamble: Please select the answer that best describes you.
CAPE.name: CAPE

questions.prompt: 1. I worry about almost everything.
2. I get emotional easily, often for very little reason.
3. I fear being alone in life more than anything else.
4. I get stuck on one way of doing things, even when it is clear it will not work.
5. I get irritated easily by all sorts of things.

PID.preamble: This is a list of things different people might say about themselves. We are interested in how you would describe yourself. Weíd like you to take your time and read each statement carefully, selecting the response that best describes you.
PID.name: PID

questions.prompt: 1. My attention is often focused on aspects of myself I wish I'd stop thinking about.
2. I always seem to be ""re-hashing"" in my mind recent things I've said or done.
3. Sometimes it is hard for me to shut off thoughts about myself.
4. Long after an argument or disagreement is over with, my thoughts keep going back to what happened.
5. I tend to ""ruminate"" or dwell over things that happen to me for a really long time afterward.
6. I don't waste time re-thinking things that are over and done with.
7. Often I'm playing back over in my mind how I acted in a past situation.
8. I often find myself re-evaluating something I've done.
9. I never ruminate or dwell on myself for very long.
10. It is easy for me to put unwanted thoughts out of my mind.
11. I often reflect on episodes in my life that I should no longer concern myself with.
12. I spend a great deal of time thinking back over my embarrassing or disappointing moments.

RRQ.preamble: For each of the statements please indicate your level of agreement or disagreement by clicking one of the scale categories.
RRQ.name: RRQ

questions.prompt: 1. If I don’t have enough time to do everything, I don’t worry about it.
2. My worries overwhelm me.
3. I do not tend to worry about things.
4. Many situations make me worry.
5. I know I shouldn’t worry about things, but I just cannot help it.
6. When I am under pressure I worry a lot.
7. I am always worrying about something.
8. I find it easy to dismiss worrisome thoughts.
9. I find myself living on Mars.
10. As soon as I finish one task, I start to worry about everything else I have to do.
11. I never worry about anything.
12. When there is nothing more I can do about a concern, I don’t worry about it anymore.
13. I’ve been a worrier all my life.
14. I notice that I have been worrying about things.
15. Once I start worrying, I can’t stop.
16. I worry all the time.
17. I worry about projects until they are done.

PSWQ.preamble: Choose the response that best describes how typical or characteristic each item is of you.
PSWQ.name: PSWQ

questions.prompt: 1. Sometimes I do things impulsively that I should not do.
2. I sometimes do things to cheer myself up that I later regret.
3. I usually think carefully before I act.
4. I usually consider things carefully and logically before I make up my mind.
5. I always bring to an end what I have started.
6. I plan my schedule so that I get everything done on time.
7. I am willing to take risks.
8. I am happy to take chances.
